comments.body:
Random testing note: specs allows for better hierarchy here, so you could actually just do something like this:

```scala
name >> {
  "demonstrate offer and take with zero capacity" in real { ...
}
```

And so on, thus putting all of the tests for a single `name` under the same nesting.
Oh nice! I have to admit that I shamelessly stole these tests from `QueueSpec` so we could fix this there as well
